main event: An RC-121 aircraft observed a round-shaped ball of light in the sky while flying, identified as an astrological object.
interesting points: The object was reddish-yellow with a short tail and was smaller than a shirt button,The sighting lasted for 6 minutes,The observer was attracted to the light emitted from the object,The object was seen 35 degrees above the horizon and faded from sight after observation,It was concluded the object was a meteor based on its characteristics.
witness description: Major R. E. Michaud, Aircraft Commander, RC 121
